description: [KV Botnet Activity](https://attack.mitre.org/campaigns/C0035) utilizes multiple Bash scripts during botnet installation stages, and the final botnet payload allows for running commands in the Bash shell.(Citation: Lumen KVBotnet 2023)

external_references.description: Black Lotus Labs. (2023, December 13). Routers Roasting On An Open Firewall: The KV-Botnet Investigation. Retrieved June 10, 2024.
